resources.string: Doing this will erase any subsequent history. Are you sure?

This application requires that images be cached on your device prior to using it. This only needs to be completed on the first run, or if there are missing cached images. It will attempt to store them on an external SD card if available. Click the download button to fetch the images now.

Anei thus granted the deitas permission to tap the essense of his Arenei to create their own races. He did, however, limit the power in which they were able to pull. There was then no creature that could match the perfection of the Arenei.
